question:
The Central Asian Regional Economic Cooperation/ CAREC program has been in news recently. In this context, consider the following statements about CAREC:
  1. CAREC was set up by the World Bank.
  2. China is part of CAREC.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: CAREC was set up by the Asian Development Bank in 1997. It is aimed at promoting the economic cooperation among the countries in the central Asian region. It has been in news in context with the recent 406 million USD loan from World Bank to Pakistan for one of its projects. Statement 2 is correct: China is one of the members of CAREC. Other member states are Pakistan, Afghanistan, Kazakhstan, Azerbaijan, Tajikistan, Kyrgyz Republic, Georgia, Mongolia, Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan. World Bank and Asian Development Bank are two of its institutional partners. The KPEC project which was in news recently is to aid Pakistan and Afghanistan.
